titleStmt.title: A short testimony concerning Catherine Allardes, late wife to Iohn Fullertoune of Kinnebar who departed this life, the last day of the last moneth called February, anno 1670.
titleStmt.author: Fullerton, John, of Kinnebar, fl. 1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
